title: Traitors upset, masses jubilant: Farrukh
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 03 (APP): Minister of State for Information and Broadcasting Farrukh Habib said on Sunday the traitors were upset over the ruling of declaring the no-confidence motion as illegal while the masses were jubilant over the move.
The minister, in a tweet, said he asked the opposition about the ‘surprise’. ” We will not allow treason under any circumstances,” he maintained.
کیسا لگا سرپرائز۔ غداری کی اجازت نہیں دے گے کسی صورت بھی
— Farrukh Habib (@FarrukhHabibISF) April 3, 2022
